snippet: LEVINE--Harold. Career Bridges mourns the loss of our beloved board member, Harold "Bob" Levine. A board member from our inception 14 years ago, he contributed invaluable support to our mission of helping young opera singers. He will be sorely missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Harold. Career Bridges mourns the loss of our beloved board member, Harold "Bob" Levine. A board member from our inception 14 years ago, he contributed invaluable support to our mission of helping young opera singers. He will be sorely missed. 1/3
